verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet.<s%>

Declare <S%H5046><s%> ye among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H8085>publish,<s%> and set <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>standard;<s%> <S%H8085>publish,<s%> and <S%H3582>conceal<s%> <S%H408>not:<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is <S%H3920>taken,<s%> <S%H1078>Bel<s%> is <S%H3001>confounded,<s%> <S%H4781>Merodach<s%> is broken in <S%H2844>pieces;<s%> her <S%H6091>idols<s%> are <S%H3001>confounded,<s%> her <S%H1544>images<s%> are broken in <S%H2865>pieces.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> out of the <S%H4480>north<s%> <S%H6828><s%> there cometh <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her, <S%H1931>which<s%> shall <S%H7896>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8047>desolate,<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H1961>shall<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein: they shall <S%H5110>remove,<s%> they shall <S%H1980>depart,<s%> both <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> and <S%H929>beast.<s%>

In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> and <S%H1058>weeping:<s%> they shall <S%H1980>go,<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

They shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H2008>thitherward,<s%> saying, <S%H935>Come,<s%> and let us join <S%H3867>ourselves<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people<s%> hath <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H6>lost<s%> <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> their <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> have caused them to go <S%H8582>astray,<s%> they have turned them <S%H7725>away<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains:<s%> they have <S%H1980>gone<s%> from <S%H4480>mountain<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1389>hill,<s%> they have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> their resting <S%H7258>place.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H4672>found<s%> them have <S%H398>devoured<s%> them: and their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> We <S%H816>offend<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H6664>justice,<s%> even the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H4723>hope<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Remove <S%H5110><s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and <S%H1961>be<s%> as the he <S%H6260>goats<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H5782>raise<s%> and cause to come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> an <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H4480>country:<s%> <S%H776><s%> and they shall set themselves in <S%H6186>array<s%> against her; from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> she shall be <S%H3920>taken:<s%> their <S%H2671>arrows<s%> shall be as of a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H7919>expert<s%> man; <S%H3808>none<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> in <S%H7387>vain.<s%>
And <S%H3778>Chaldea<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H7997>spoil:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H7998>spoil<s%> her shall be <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> ye were <S%H8055>glad,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> ye <S%H5937>rejoiced,<s%> O ye <S%H8154>destroyers<s%> of mine <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> ye are grown <S%H6335>fat<s%> as the <S%H5697>heifer<s%> at <S%H1877>grass,<s%> and <S%H6670>bellow<s%> as <S%H47>bulls;<s%>

Your <S%H517>mother<s%> shall be <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H954>confounded;<s%> she that <S%H3205>bore<s%> you shall be <S%H2659>ashamed:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H319>hindmost<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> a dry <S%H6723>land,<s%> and a <S%H6160>desert.<s%>

Because of the <S%H4480>wrath<s%> <S%H7110><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> but it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3605>wholly<s%> <S%H8077>desolate:<s%> every <S%H3605>one<s%> that <S%H5674>goeth<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and <S%H8319>hiss<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H4347>plagues.<s%>

Put yourselves in <S%H6186>array<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> round <S%H5439>about:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye that <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow,<s%> <S%H3034>shoot<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> her, <S%H2550>spare<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H2671>arrows:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> she hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Shout <S%H7321><s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her round <S%H5439>about:<s%> she hath <S%H5414>given<s%> her <S%H3027>hand:<s%> her <S%H803>foundations<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> her <S%H2346>walls<s%> are thrown <S%H2040>down:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> take <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> upon her; <S%H834>as<s%> she hath <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto her.

Cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2232>sower<s%> from <S%H4480>Babylon,<s%> <S%H894><s%> and him that <S%H8610>handleth<s%> the <S%H4038>sickle<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest:<s%> for <S%H4480>fear<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3238>oppressing<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> they shall <S%H6437>turn<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his own <S%H776>land.<s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> is a <S%H6340>scattered<s%> <S%H7716>sheep;<s%> the <S%H738>lions<s%> have driven him <S%H5080>away:<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> him; and <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> hath broken his <S%H6105>bones.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and his <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I have <S%H6485>punished<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

And I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> again <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H5116>habitation,<s%> and he shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> on <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be sought <S%H1245>for,<s%> and there shall be <S%H369>none;<s%> and the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H4672>found:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H5545>pardon<s%> them <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H7604>reserve.<s%>

Go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4850>Merathaim,<s%> even <S%H5921>against<s%> it, and <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6489>Pekod:<s%> <S%H2717>waste<s%> and utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee.
A <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H4421>battle<s%> is in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>

How <S%H349><s%> is the <S%H6360>hammer<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> cut <S%H1438>asunder<s%> and <S%H7665>broken!<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> is <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations!<s%>

I have laid a <S%H3369>snare<s%> for thee, and thou art <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3920>taken,<s%> O <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H859>thou<s%> wast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>aware:<s%> thou art <S%H4672>found,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H8610>caught,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thou hast <S%H1624>striven<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H214>armory,<s%> and hath brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of his <S%H2195>indignation:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>

Come <S%H935><s%> against her from the utmost <S%H4480>border,<s%> <S%H7093><s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> her <S%H3965>storehouses:<s%> cast her <S%H5549>up<s%> as <S%H6194>heaps,<s%> and <S%H2763>destroy<s%> her utterly: let <S%H408>nothing<s%> of her <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7611>left.<s%>

Slay <S%H2717><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H6499>bullocks;<s%> let them go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter:<s%> <S%H1945>woe<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> them! <S%H3588>for<s%> their <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that <S%H5127>flee<s%> and <S%H6412>escape<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> to <S%H5046>declare<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of his <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

Call <S%H8085>together<s%> the <S%H7228>archers<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H894>Babylon:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye that <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow,<s%> <S%H2583>camp<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it round <S%H5439>about;<s%> <S%H1961>let<s%> <S%H408>none<s%> thereof <S%H6413>escape:<s%> <S%H7999>recompense<s%> her according to her <S%H6467>work;<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> she hath <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto her: <S%H3588>for<s%> she hath been <S%H2102>proud<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> shall her young <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> in the <S%H7339>streets,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> shall be cut <S%H1826>off<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> thee, O thou most <S%H2087>proud,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> that I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> thee.

And the most <S%H2087>proud<s%> shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> and <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall raise him <S%H6965>up:<s%> and I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in his <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> him.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that took them <S%H7617>captives<s%> held them <S%H2388>fast;<s%> they <S%H3985>refused<s%> to let them <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Their <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> is <S%H2389>strong;<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name:<s%> he shall throughly <S%H7378>plead<s%> <S%H7378><s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H7379>cause,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> he may give <S%H7280>rest<s%> <S%H853><s%> to the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7264>disquiet<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

A <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H413>upon<s%> her <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H413>upon<s%> her <S%H2450>wise<s%> men.

A <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H907>liars;<s%> and they shall <S%H2973>dote:<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H413>upon<s%> her mighty <S%H1368>men;<s%> and they shall be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%>

A <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H413>upon<s%> their <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H413>upon<s%> their <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the mingled <S%H6154>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of her; and they shall <S%H1961>become<s%> as <S%H802>women:<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H413>upon<s%> her <S%H214>treasures;<s%> and they shall be <S%H962>robbed.<s%>

A <S%H2721>drought<s%> is <S%H413>upon<s%> her <S%H4325>waters;<s%> and they shall be dried <S%H3001>up:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it is the <S%H776>land<s%> of graven <S%H6456>images,<s%> and <S%H1931>they<s%> are <S%H1984>mad<s%> upon their <S%H367>idols.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> the wild beasts of the <S%H6728>desert<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the wild beasts of the <S%H338>islands<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> there, and the <S%H1323>owls<s%> <S%H3284><s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein: and it shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H5331>forever;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall it be dwelt <S%H7931>in<s%> <S%H5704>from<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

As <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4114>overthrew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> and the <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> cities thereof, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> so shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall any <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> therein.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> from the <S%H4480>north,<s%> <S%H6828><s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall be raised <S%H5782>up<s%> from the <S%H4480>coasts<s%> <S%H3411><s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
